column1: Welcome to IcarOS B_1.5.21! Your job is to assist the onsite employee. Please tell the on-site employee to press the start button
The power was knocked out! Please navigate the on-site employee to the elevator
Press the elevator button to send the elevator down
Please wait for the elevator to reach its destination
Unlock the door for the on-site employee using the DOOR app
Use the RODS app to tell the on-site employee which fuel rods are broken
Tell employee to place spent fuel rods in orange water bin
Tell the employee to locate the Fuel Rods room
Use the admin app to unlock the fuel rods door
Use the rods app to inform the employee which rods to obtain
Have the employee insert new fuel rods in their correct location
All rods in correct locations. Tell employee to flip switch on engine
Good work! The power is on. Tell the employee to proceed through door to next elevator
Send elevator to Cargo Bay
Open the CLAW app to open the crane's control panel
Work with employee to clear a path through the storage containers.
Use the admin app to unlock the cargo bay door
Send elevator to vats room
